modName: Adventurers of Skyrim - All follower class types
summary:
Choose between 7 followers who can match your play style and have a good journey
All of them are good from level 1 to 100. They are not overpowered
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1][size=2]Searching for companions who can match your playstyle? [/size][/size][size=2]I present you this amazing adventurers gathering in the [/size]Sleeping Giant Inn (Riverwood)[size=2] all of them Level with you and have their own Fighting style  [/size]They are not custom voiced[size=2] [/size][/color][/font][font=Arial]
[/font][center][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]
They are 7 adventurers 
[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][center]Odilo Hellthorne [/center][img]http://th00.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/i/2010/323/d/d/barbarian_highlander_by_thebastardson-d335i7l.jpg[/img]
[/size]
[size=1]Little Backstory[/size]
Big strong man who can do alot Damage! A true Survivor! Lost his eye in a fight with a sabre cat.
Like Riverwood because is nice and lazy and he can drink his Ale 
Never met his real Parents
[quote]- If it bleeds I can kill it.[/quote]Focus: DAMAGE / TANK

[list][*][size=2] Two-Handed 
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2] Heavy Armor [/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]PERKS[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][list=1][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Barbarian
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Champion Stance
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Sweep
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Juggernaut[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[size=4][center]Lola Ravenheart[/center].[/size][img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-u4a4edDdr-M/VAyNqzpf6YI/AAAAAAAABLc/XVGGtP92F5Q/s1600/archer.jpg[/img]
[size=4]
[/size][size=1]Little Backstory[/size]
Pretty Wood Elf, Train headshots in Bandits, She love to surprise her victims
Stay in Riverwood because she can learn something with Faendal
Dream with the perfect man
[quote]- The good archer hits the target even before it fired.[/quote]Focus: RANGED COMBAT

[/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Archery 
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Sneak 
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Light Armor [/size]
[/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]PERKS[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][list=1][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Overdraw[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Critical Shot[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]QuickShot[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Ranger[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]AgileDefender[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Lightfoot[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[size=4][center]Exodus the Wrathfull[/center][img]http://www.gamesta.com/wp-content/gallery/dragons-dogma-key-art/dragons-dogma-key-art-3.jpg[/img]
[/size]
[size=1]Little Backstory[/size]
[size=2]Pyromaniac, banished from the College of Winterhold for burning an student 
Stay in Riverwood to Relax and do not set anything on Fire
[/size]He can't control his love for Fire sometimes, so he burn everyone who oppose him! 
No one knows his real name 
[quote]- Things are so much prettier when they burn.[/quote]Focus: DAMAGE

[/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Destruction: Focused on Fire spells
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Alteration 
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Restoration 
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Conjuration: Only Fire Atronach[/size]
[/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]PERKS[/size][size=3] [/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][list=1][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Mage armor[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Regeneration[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Recovery[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Lightfoot[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Augmented Flames [/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][center][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=4]Yashar Moonbreeze [/size][size=1]Require Dawnguard[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1][img]http://th00.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/f/2011/295/7/c/vampire_by_alexalexandrov-d4dkgjo.jpg[/img]
[/size]
[size=1]Little Backstory
[/size][size=2]Before becoming a vampire, Yashar was a drunk
He drank too much and ended up doing stupid things, like to end up in a vampire house
His terrible alcoholic blood did the vampire stop sucking their blood and leaving him to die
Then he woke up three days later, Undead
Now he needs to control his two vices Alcohol and blood ...
[/size][quote]- It is difficult when your drink run from you in panic.[/quote]Focus: NECROMANCY

[/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Conjuration: Focused on Necromancy[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Destruction: Focused on Ice spells[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]PERKS[/size]
[/color][/font][/*]
[/list][list=1][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Augmented Frost[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]LightFoot[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Necromancy[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Darksouls[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]CustomFit[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[size=4][center]Isabel Silverheart[/center][/size][img]https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/9f/0d/80/9f0d80e05627edc12beb4cc8531fae4b.jpg[/img]

[size=1]Little Backstory[/size]
[size=2]Her parents were killed by bandits, and she can not do anything[/size]
Heard that the dragonborn had returned, and that the world could be destroyed by Alduin
She has a brave heart and never give up
Her Shield will protected you from any enemy
[quote]- If the sky fall, i will rise my shield to protect you.[/quote]Focus: PURE TANK

[/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Block[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]Heavy Armor[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][list][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]PERKS[/size]
[/color][/font][/*]
[/list][list=1][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Juggernalt[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Shield Wall[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Deflect Arrows[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Elemental Protection[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Avoid Death[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][center]Baden the Venomous[/center][/size][img]http://i63.fastpic.ru/big/2014/0922/fd/d1c1a13d97ccaebaddd48c67a11d2cfd.jpg[/img]

[size=1]Little Backstory[/size][size=2]
No one knows where it came from and no one dares to ask
He said he had killed all living creatures
Says not get anything challenging to kill, the only creature that he is interested now is dragons
Loves see his victim die poisoned and writhing, some say he eats their hearts...
[/size][size=2][quote]- I just wanted them to die," said Poison. "They didn't have to make such a drama about it.[/quote]Focus: DUAL-WIELD / DAMAGE[/size]

[/color][/font][list][*][color=#f4f4f4][font=Arial][size=2]One Handed[/size][/font][/color][/*]
[*][color=#f4f4f4][font=Arial][size=2]Light Armor[/size][/font][/color][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][list][*][color=#f4f4f4][font=Arial][size=2]PERKS[/size][/font][/color][/*]
[/list][list=1][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Dual Flurry[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][color=#f4f4f4][font=Arial][size=1]Dual Savagery[/size][/font][/color][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Deft Movement[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Windwalker[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Bladesman[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Lightfoot[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[size=4][center]Vyk Stormwalker[/center][img]http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/009/b/4/storm_mage_by_diegoocunha-d5qzkl9.png[/img][/size]
[size=1]Little Backstory[/size][size=2]
Fascinated by lightning in the storm since she was a child,Vyk devoted much of his life learning about them
And now she can control them
She wants to show its value to the world and will do it fighting alongside the best hero of all time
The Dragonborn
[/size][size=2][quote]- If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm[/quote]Focus: DAMAGE[/size]

[/color][/font][list][*][color=#f4f4f4][font=Arial][size=2]Destruction: Focused on Lightning Spells[/size][/font][/color][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/font][list][*][color=#f4f4f4][font=Arial][size=2]PERKS[/size][/font][/color][/*]
[/list][list=1][*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Disintegrate[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Impact[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Mage Armor[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Augmented Shock[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]Lightfoot[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Arial][color=#f4f4f4][size=1]
[/size][size=1]_______________[/size]____________________________

[size=2]They are all in the Sleeping Giant Inn (Riverwood)
________________________________________[/size]

[size=4][size=3][ ! ][/size] Requirements[/size]

Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8

[size=3][ ! ][/size][size=3] Know [/size][size=3]Errors !

[/size]. A glitch with the Followers make All of them have a Hunting Bow
- Solution: Just remove it from their inventory

. Sometimes some of them may not appear
- Solution: Just change the load order!

[size=4]Installation 

[/size]Manual: Drag the Data Folder and drop to your skyrim folder
Or just Download and Install With NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) 

[size=4]Future Plans
[/size]
 [X] DONE!    |  Paladin  ..............  Sword and Shield 
 [X] DONE!    |  Vampire ..............  Necromancy and Ice Spells
 [X] DONE!    |  Thief ..................  Dual Wield 
 [X] DONE!    |  Storm Mage  .......... Focused on Shock spells
